alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:46PM PST until December 26 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 7 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches on the Waterville Plateau. Ice accumulations between a glaze and a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Ephrata, Badger Mountain Road, Moses Lake, Creston, Grand Coulee, Ritzville, Wilbur, Quincy, Mansfield, Harrington, Odessa, Othello, Waterville, and Coulee City. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau
